message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. We believe its value exceeds $1200000 to us, reflecting its unique features and the extensive resources invested in its development. Considering its unparalleled excellence, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $1500000. We understand that the true value may be subjective, but we trust that you will appreciate the craftsmanship and benefits this product offers. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer.

I appreciate the time and effort that went into crafting this product, and I'm interested in purchasing it. However, $1500000 is above my budget. I'm willing to pay $1200000 for the product, considering its features and quality. I believe this price is more reasonable and reflects the value I see in this product. Please let me know if this is something you'd be willing to consider.
